abstract: For those who love cats, a new high-tech way to frolic with felines.
snippet: For those who love cats, a new high-tech way to frolic with felines.
lead_paragraph: While visiting her mother in Pennsylvania this month, Lauren Pytel, a 47-year-old high school English teacher who lives in Tudor City, found herself pining for her cats, Tiggles ap Caduet and Munchie Effexorov, and their recently deceased siblings, Claritin and Zoloft.

headline.main: Playtime With Cats, at Any Distance
